name: Political Arena
description: Strategic maneuvering in the halls of power with campaigns, debates, and policy battles

cards.title: Seasoned Senator
cards.description: Master of political maneuvering and legislative prowess
cards.imageDescription: Elderly politician in a suit, holding a gavel, standing behind a podium with microphones
cards.effect: On summon: draw 2 cards; Passive: +1 card per turn
cards.flavor: Experience counts for everything in politics.

cards.title: Brilliant Debate
cards.description: Outmaneuver your opponent with superior rhetoric
cards.imageDescription: Two politicians engaged in heated debate on a stage with an audience
cards.effect: Negate the next opponent action, gain 2 MP
cards.flavor: Words can be sharper than any blade.

cards.title: Grassroots Campaign
cards.description: Mobilize supporters to strengthen your position
cards.imageDescription: Crowd of people holding campaign signs and cheering at a rally
cards.effect: Add 1 common card from your collection to your hand
cards.flavor: Every vote counts, and every supporter matters.

cards.title: Breaking Scandal
cards.description: A damaging revelation rocks the political landscape
cards.imageDescription: Newspapers with bold headlines, politicians looking shocked or defensive
cards.effect: Opponent discards 2 cards at random
cards.flavor: In politics, your past can become your present's greatest enemy.

cards.title: Media Mogul
cards.description: Control the narrative through media influence
cards.imageDescription: Businessperson in an expensive suit, holding a tablet showing news headlines
cards.effect: On summon: +3 MP; Passive: All your events cost 1 less MP
cards.flavor: Control the message, control the game.

cards.title: Polling Data
cards.description: Gather intelligence on your opponent's strategy
cards.imageDescription: Person analyzing charts and graphs on a computer screen
cards.effect: Look at opponent's hand, then draw 1 card
cards.flavor: Knowledge is power, especially in the political arena.

cards.title: Corporate Lobbyist
cards.description: A well-connected influencer who can sway opinions and votes
cards.imageDescription: Well-dressed person in expensive suit, shaking hands with politicians, briefcase full of money
cards.effect: When attacking: Opponent discards 1 card; On summon: Gain 2 MP
cards.flavor: Money talks, and this one speaks very loudly.

cards.title: Grassroots Activist
cards.description: A passionate advocate with the power to mobilize the masses
cards.imageDescription: Energetic person with megaphone, leading a crowd of supporters with signs
cards.effect: On summon: Draw 1 card; When attacking: +1 damage for each card in your hand
cards.flavor: The voice of the people can move mountains.

cards.title: Supreme Leader
cards.description: A master of political manipulation and strategic control who can sway entire populations with a single speech
cards.imageDescription: Charismatic political figure in an ornate suit, standing at a podium with a crowd of supporters, radiating commanding presence
cards.effect: On summon: Take control of target opponent champion until end of turn; Passive: Draw 1 extra card each turn; When attacking: Force opponent to discard 1 card
cards.flavor: The pen is mightier than the sword, but charisma is mightier than both.

cards.title: Presidential Candidate
cards.description: The ultimate political aspirant with the charisma and strategy to win the highest office
cards.imageDescription: Charismatic candidate at a massive rally, crowd waving flags, campaign banners everywhere
cards.effect: On summon: Draw 3 cards; Passive: +2 card per turn; When attacking: Force opponent to discard 2 cards
cards.flavor: The road to power is paved with promises, and I intend to keep them all.

cards.title: Spy Master
cards.description: The ultimate intelligence operative who controls information networks and political secrets
cards.imageDescription: Mysterious figure in shadows, surrounded by classified documents and surveillance equipment
cards.effect: On summon: Look at opponent's entire hand and choose 2 cards to discard; Passive: When you play an event, deal 1 damage to all opponents; When attacking: +2 damage if MP >= 3
cards.flavor: Knowledge is power, and I know everything worth knowing.

cards.title: Corporate CEO
cards.description: The ultimate business leader who wields economic power to influence political outcomes
cards.imageDescription: Powerful CEO in an expensive suit, standing in a corporate boardroom with global maps
cards.effect: On summon: All opponent champions lose 2 MP regeneration; Passive: When you play a creature, gain 1 MP; When attacking: Deal 2 damage to all opponents
cards.flavor: In the modern world, wealth is the ultimate political currency.

cards.title: Diplomatic Envoy
cards.description: The master negotiator who can forge alliances and manipulate international relations
cards.imageDescription: Elegant diplomat in formal attire, shaking hands with world leaders at a summit
cards.effect: On summon: Take control of target opponent champion until end of turn; Passive: All your events cost 1 less MP; When attacking: Heal 3 HP to player
cards.flavor: Peace through strength, prosperity through cooperation, victory through diplomacy.

cards.title: Revolutionary Leader
cards.description: The ultimate catalyst for change who can overthrow established systems and create new orders
cards.imageDescription: Passionate revolutionary on a barricade, leading a crowd with raised fist, banners flying
cards.effect: On summon: Add 3 random rare political cards to your hand; Passive: When you play a creature, deal 1 damage to all opponents; When attacking: Deal damage equal to the number of creatures you control
cards.flavor: The system is broken, and I am the hammer that will shatter it.

cards.title: Political Maneuver
cards.description: Execute a complex political strategy to gain advantage
cards.imageDescription: Politician making strategic moves on a political chessboard with various pieces
cards.effect: Look at opponent's hand, choose 1 card for them to discard, draw 2 cards
cards.flavor: In politics, the best offense is a good defense, and the best defense is knowing your enemy's hand.

cards.title: Media Blackout
cards.description: Control the narrative by limiting information flow
cards.imageDescription: Newsroom with screens going dark, journalists looking confused and frustrated
cards.effect: Opponent cannot play events next turn, all your champions gain +1 AP this turn
cards.flavor: Control the message, control the perception, control the outcome.

cards.title: Opposition Research
cards.description: Gather damaging information about your political opponents
cards.imageDescription: Researcher going through files and documents, finding compromising information
cards.effect: Look at opponent's entire hand, choose 2 cards to discard
cards.flavor: In politics, knowledge is not just power - it's ammunition.

cards.title: Campaign Funding
cards.description: Secure financial backing to support your political agenda
cards.imageDescription: Business leaders writing checks, politician shaking hands with donors
cards.effect: Gain 3 MP, draw 2 cards
cards.flavor: Money makes the world go round, especially in politics.

cards.title: Public Relations
cards.description: Manage your public image to maintain support
cards.imageDescription: PR team working on positive press coverage, smiling politician in good light
cards.effect: Restore 4 HP to all your champions, prevent 2 damage this turn
cards.flavor: Perception is reality, and reality is what you make it.

cards.title: Legislative Session
cards.description: Call a special session to push through important legislation
cards.imageDescription: Legislators voting in a special session, gavel coming down for order
cards.effect: Double the effect of your next card this turn, gain 1 MP
cards.flavor: When the time is right, action must be swift and decisive.

cards.title: Press Conference
cards.description: Address the media to shape public opinion
cards.imageDescription: Politician at podium answering questions from reporters with flashing cameras
cards.effect: Draw 1 card, gain 1 MP
cards.flavor: Spin is an art form, and I am the artist.

cards.title: Constituency Outreach
cards.description: Connect with voters to build grassroots support
cards.imageDescription: Politician shaking hands with voters at a community event, smiling families
cards.effect: Add 1 common card from your collection to your hand
cards.flavor: Politics begins and ends with the people.

cards.title: Policy Paper
cards.description: Publish a detailed policy proposal to gain intellectual credibility
cards.imageDescription: Think tank researchers presenting a policy paper to interested audience
cards.effect: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, choose 1 to draw
cards.flavor: Ideas drive progress, and progress drives votes.

cards.title: Campaign Rally
cards.description: Hold a public event to energize your base
cards.imageDescription: Massive crowd at political rally, banners waving, supporters cheering
cards.effect: All your champions gain +1 AP this turn
cards.flavor: The energy of the crowd is contagious and powerful.

cards.title: Op-Ed Piece
cards.description: Publish an opinion article to influence public discourse
cards.imageDescription: Newspaper with prominent opinion piece, readers discussing the article
cards.effect: Opponent loses 1 MP regeneration this turn
cards.flavor: The pen may not be mightier than the sword, but it's a lot cheaper to file.

cards.title: Constituency Service
cards.description: Provide direct assistance to voters to build loyalty
cards.imageDescription: Government office helping constituents with paperwork and services
cards.effect: Restore 2 HP to all your champions
cards.flavor: Service builds trust, and trust builds power.

cards.title: Debate Preparation
cards.description: Study your opponent's positions to exploit weaknesses
cards.imageDescription: Campaign team studying opponent's past speeches and voting record
cards.effect: Look at opponent's hand, prevent 1 damage to target champion this turn
cards.flavor: Knowledge is the best weapon in any debate.

cards.title: Grassroots Fundraising
cards.description: Raise small donations from many supporters
cards.imageDescription: Community fundraiser with many small donors contributing modest amounts
cards.effect: Gain 2 MP, draw 1 card
cards.flavor: Many small voices can create a mighty roar.

cards.title: Polling Booth
cards.description: Set up voting infrastructure to increase participation
cards.imageDescription: Voting booths with citizens casting ballots, election officials monitoring
cards.effect: Draw 2 cards, gain 1 fatigue
cards.flavor: Democracy works best when everyone participates.

cards.title: Campaign Manager
cards.description: Hire a professional to coordinate your campaign efforts
cards.imageDescription: Experienced campaign manager directing staff and coordinating strategy
cards.effect: All your champions gain +1 DP this turn, gain 1 MP
cards.flavor: Even the best candidate needs great management to succeed.

cards.title: Political Intern
cards.description: An eager young staffer ready to do the legwork
cards.imageDescription: Young intern carrying files and coffee, working late in campaign office
cards.effect: Passive: Gain 1 MP each turn; When attacking: Look at opponent's hand
cards.flavor: Every great political career starts with someone fetching coffee.

cards.title: Pollster
cards.description: A data analyst who can predict and influence voting patterns
cards.imageDescription: Statistician analyzing polling data on computer screens, charts and graphs visible
cards.effect: Passive: When you play a skill, draw 1 card; When attacking: Restore 1 HP to target champion
cards.flavor: Numbers don't lie, but they can be... creatively interpreted.
